title: Magnificent Meatball Maker
description: In Magnificent Meatball Maker, Timmy, and aspiring chef, likes to help in his uncle's restaurant. Although he is only ten years old, his uncle Mario has entrusted him with a secret recipe. When trouble arises in the kitchen, he saves the day by using his uncle's secret meatball recipe. Not only does he impress a famous athlete, he makes his uncle proud , too! Rich, figurative helps students visualize and learn about cause-and-effect relationships.
highFrequencyWords: bistro, coveted, critics, culinary, implications, ingredients, investors, prep, reservations, signature
